version_description:
Added an amazing new High Resolution mode with a 50% increase in resolution so your Qlones look even better!
We listened to your important feedback and made many improvements to make the flow of the app much better.

Significantly optimized app size!
We continued to listen to your important feedback and made additional improvements to make the flow of the app much better.

Scanning speed optimized from very fast to Ultra-fast, even on older devices!
Orientation for image and GIF export now resembles the orientation in the collection view!
Additional improvements and fixes to make the flow of the app much better.

We added a fantastic top flattening option to make it easier for you to scan objects with a flat top.
We added a direct Twitter export option so you can easily share your 3D models.
And many other improvements, optimizations and fixes to make the flow of the app much better.

AR View - Display your models in augmented reality on the mat (...and pinch to zoom).
Wire-frame - Mesh view now includes the wire-frame so you can clearly see the quality of the models.
Merge another pose - We improved it so it works better on more types of objects.

Added a free direct export to i.materialise - an amazing online 3D printing service and community for designers & inventors.
Fixed some issues to improve the overall flow of the app.

New subscription options that give you UNLIMITED exports!
Sharing on social made easier - you can now post your 3D models on Facebook, Twitter and Instagram with one Click!
New Video export option (MP4)

Optimizations for iOS 11 + New subscription options that give you UNLIMITED exports!
Sharing on social made easier - you can now post your 3D models on Facebook, Twitter and Instagram with one Click!
New Video export option (MP4)
Fixes and optimizations to the one-click social sharing of 3D models!

ARKit and model import! Here are the full details:
AR View is now utilizing Apple’s ARKit! So you can beam your models back to reality without a mat. (On supported devices)
You can now send your unlocked OBJ models to other Qlone users by email and they can import them into the app by long pressing the ZIP attachment.

Optimizations for iOS 11 + ARKit and model import! Here are the full details:
AR View is now utilizing Apple’s ARKit! So you can beam your models back to reality without a mat. (On supported devices)
You can now send your unlocked OBJ models to other Qlone users by email and they can import them into the app by long pressing the ZIP attachment.

Optimizations and fixes! Significant changes from last versions include:
You can now send your unlocked OBJ models to other Qlone users by email and they can import them into the app by long pressing the ZIP attachment.
AR View is now utilizing Apple’s ARKit! So you can beam your models back to reality without a mat. (On supported devices)
We fixed social sharing to Twitter and Facebook on iOS 11.
We optimized ARKit view and social sharing to Twitter, Facebook and Instagram for iOS 11.

Improved stability of the AR Dome while scanning!
Many more fixes and optimizations!

Re-texturing feature that makes sure the model looks as best as possible from your selected 3D pose.
Optimizations and Improved stability on older devices.
Fixes and optimizations for iPhone X.
More fixes and optimizations for iPhone X.
New Hybrid Scanning Technology - We have made a giant leap forward in the quality of scanning!
Many fixes and optimizations to our New Hybrid Scanning Technology - We have made a giant leap forward in the quality of scanning!
You can now manually merge two poses of the model if the automatic merge result is not satisfactory!
Fixed Automatic Merging!
Significantly optimised scanning speed and memory consumption for a much smoother experience on all devices!

We listened to your important feedback and added a new one-time Unlimited Exports pricing option!
Added a new GLB (Binary glTF) Export option and USDZ is coming soon!
Improved the ARKit experience which now works on vertical planes as well.
New and improved re-texturing mechanism.
Many many bug fixes!

We listened to your important feedback and added a new one-time Unlimited Exports pricing option!
Added a new GLB (Binary glTF) Export option and USDZ is coming soon!
Improved the ARKit experience which now works on vertical planes as well.
New and improved re-texturing mechanism.
Many many bug fixes!
Significantly improved scanning quality now generates much more accurate 3D meshes and better model texturing!
Significantly improved scanning quality now generates much more accurate 3D meshes and better model texturing!
Exciting news! You can now export your 3D models to Apple’s new USDZ format for native AR experiences!
Exciting news! You can now export your 3D models to Apple’s new USDZ format for native AR experiences!
Qlone just got better! With our significantly improved Texturing, your 3D models will look better than ever!
Significantly optimized performance for a super-fast and silky-smooth scanning experience!
Optimizations for the new iPhone XS, iPhone XS Max and iPhone XR!
Qlone just got better! With the new 4K resolution scanning, your 3D models will look better than ever!
Optimizations and fixes to the new 4K resolution scanning!

Get ready for some real magic! With new Auto-Animation in the AR view you can bring your models to life!
You can now also record the AR session for sharing!
New optional back mat, which will make your 3D models look better than ever!
Improved merging of two poses - not just better but also faster!
Updated for the new iPad Pros!
Many fixes and optimizations!

Qlone just got better! With the new beautify options you can easily enhance the 3D model's appearance with Brightness, Saturation and Sharpness settings.
New Anti-Flicker menu option allows you to adjust the camera to always get the best quality images.
Many fixes and optimizations!

Qlone just got better! With the new beautify options you can easily enhance the 3D model's appearance with Brightness, Saturation and Sharpness settings.
New Anti-Flicker menu option allows you to adjust the camera to always get the best quality images.
Many fixes and optimizations!
Fixes and optimizations to the option to Merge two scans.
Fixes and Optimizations for a smoother scanning experience!
Significantly improved scanning quality now generates more accurate 3D meshes and better model texturing!

Create, publish, and share magical AR experiences on Snapchat with our new direct export to a Lens Studio Project!
Added a new FBX export option!
Significantly improved texturing will make your 3D models look better than ever!
Significantly improved texturing will make your 3D models look better than ever!
Fixes and Optimizations!

New Low-Poly switch in the export screen allows you to significantly reduce the file size when you export your 3D models!
General UI refinements.
Significantly improved texturing will make your 3D models look better than ever!
Fixes and Optimizations for a smoother scanning experience!
Optimizations for iOS 13 and the new iPhone 11 models!
More optimizations for iOS 13 and the new iPhone 11 models!

Significantly improved model smoothing will make your 3D models look better than ever!
3D Printing enthusiasts - You can now enhance the mesh details with the new Bump map modifier!
General fixes and optimizations!
General fixes and optimizations!
With many fixes and optimizations, this is our best version ever! Enjoy!
With many fixes and optimizations, this is our best version ever! Enjoy!
With many fixes and optimizations, this is our best version ever! Enjoy!
Optimisations for the new iPhone SE model!
Optimisations for the new iPhone SE model!

Significantly improved 4K scanning quality!
General fixes and optimizations.

Improved experience in the Sculpt Modifier!
General fixes and stability optimizations.

GLB export now includes animation!
Enhanced humanoid animation in AR view!
General fixes and stability optimizations.
General fixes and optimizations!

Exciting news! You can now import any 3D model into your gallery!
Import in any 3D format (40+ formats) to view, modify or bring it to life in AR with our automatic animation!

You can now import any 3D model into your gallery!
Import in any 3D format (40+ formats) to view, modify or bring it to life in AR with our automatic animation!
Significant UI enhancement! Just tap a model in the gallery to view it in 3D!
We enhanced the Resize operator and added model Volume information! Check these out in the Shape modifier!
Beautiful optimisations for iOS 14!
More beautiful optimisations for iOS 14!

Export an animated PNG sequence with a transparent background!
Optional Logo watermark removal from the GIF, Video and image exports!
General fixes and stability optimisations!

New flash button for scanning in Low-Light conditions!
Export in GLB with or without the Animation data!
General fixes and stability optimisations!
Fixes and optimizations to the model import functionality!
Optimizations for the new iPhone 12 models!

Fixes to USDZ model import!
Added people occlusion effect to the AR View!
General fixes and optimizations!

Fixed upload to Sketchfab!
